languages.text: "Думаю, даже для вас, уважаемый Ульфар, воцарившийся там пандемониум был бы слишком тяжким испытанием. Хотя соглашусь — хоть бы чуток понаблюдать, как ксеносы платят за свои пороки..."
"I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, даже для вас, уважаемый Ульфар, воцарившийся там пандемониум был бы слишком тяжким испытанием. Хотя соглашусь — хоть бы чуток понаблюдать, как ксеносы платят за свои пороки..."

traits.locale_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我认为即便是对你而言，那里群魔乱舞的情形也实在是过于折磨，乌尔法大人。不过，我赞同你的话，我也希望能瞥见那群异形遭到报应的样子……”
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: “我认为即便是对你而言，那里群魔乱舞的情形也实在是过于折磨，乌尔法大人。不过，我赞同你的话，我也希望能瞥见那群异形遭到报应的样子……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je crois que la pagaille que nous avons semée serait une épreuve bien trop difficile à soutenir, seigneur Ulfar, même pour vous. Même si je dois bien admettre que j'aimerais moi aussi pouvoir assister au spectacle... »
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que la pagaille que nous avons semée serait une épreuve bien trop difficile à soutenir, seigneur Ulfar, même pour vous. Même si je dois bien admettre que j'aimerais moi aussi pouvoir assister au spectacle... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Creo que el maremágnum sería demasiado incluso para usted, mi señor Ulfar. Aunque debo admitir que yo también querría ver a los xenos llevarse su merecido...».
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que el maremágnum sería demasiado incluso para usted, mi señor Ulfar. Aunque debo admitir que yo también querría ver a los xenos llevarse su merecido...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「荒れ狂う地獄はあなたにも大変な試練でしたな、ウルファー閣下。同意しますが、私としてはむしろ異種族に天罰がくだる様を一目見たいものです…」
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: 「荒れ狂う地獄はあなたにも大変な試練でしたな、ウルファー閣下。同意しますが、私としてはむしろ異種族に天罰がくだる様を一目見たいものです…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Das Pandämonium, das dort tobt, wäre wohl selbst für Euch eine zu große Tortur, mein Lord Ulfar. Wobei ich zustimme, auch ich wünschte, ich hätte einen Blick darauf erhaschen können, wie die Xenos bekommen, was sie verdienen ..."
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: "Das Pandämonium, das dort tobt, wäre wohl selbst für Euch eine zu große Tortur, mein Lord Ulfar. Wobei ich zustimme, auch ich wünschte, ich hätte einen Blick darauf erhaschen können, wie die Xenos bekommen, was sie verdienen ..."

languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

languages.text: "Oradaki kargaşa senin için bile uğraştırıcı bir imtihan olur lordum Ulfar. Fakat sana katılıyorum, ben de zenoların hak ettiği cezayı aldığını görmek isterdim."
languages.original_text: "I think the pandemonium raging there would be too much of an ordeal even for you, my lord Ulfar. Though I agree, I too wish I could catch a glimpse of the xenos getting their comeuppance..."

traits.locale_text: "Oradaki kargaşa sizin için bile uğraştırıcı bir mesele olur lordum Ulfar. Fakat size katılıyorum, ben de zenoların hak ettiği cezayı aldığını görmek isterdim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
